transcription.text: Hello, this is Brian. Brian, hey, it's Scott. I've got a new laptop, and I'm trying to log in to PCR, but I don't remember what the website is to log in to the database. Can you help me? Scott, I wish I could. I'm in my car, and I don't have access to my computer right now. Did you call tech support? What did they say? No answer. All right. um you know one second scott brian i think we may have found it we've been digging on our own we went to the uh the website for uh support and stuff i think we're there choose um ocean medical again and then your username i think it's just kayla and then you'll need your password okay brian thanks bro i didn't mean to bother you but thank you so much i think we're good great all right scott take care You too. Bye-bye. Bye.
